item.title: Education Department Releases Its First Ever Tibetan Animated Film for Children
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Dharamshala: Promoting language, identity, culture and traditional history through digital storytelling, the Department of Education, CTA released its first ever animated film on all-time favourite fable, དྲན་པ་བརྗེད་སླ་བའི་ཨ་ཁུ་ཕག་པ་། (the Forgetful Agu Phagpa) and a Tibetan dubbed version of Buddha’s Sutra, Life of Buddha. The ceremony was attended by Kalon Ngodup Tsering, Department of Education, Secretaries Nangsa...
